result.execSummary:
Matthew Todd Hovland was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Matthew Todd Hovland was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Extradition-Arrest Prior to Requisition (Winnebago Co, IL)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Matthew Todd Hovland

records.addlTxt: 8:21 AM Defendant Matthew Todd Hovland not in court.  Attorney Colin Nicholson, for attorney C. James Fitzgerald, in court for Matthew Todd Hovland.  Attorney Alexander David Goulart in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has been extradited; Court orders case dismissed.
Review hearing on October 19, 2022 at 08:15 am.

3:26 PM Defendant Matthew Todd Hovland appeared by video, in custody at the Rock County Jail.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Matthew Todd Hovland.  Attorney David S Olson in court for State of Wisconsin.
Review hearing scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Review hearing on September 16, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

10:53 AM Defendant Matthew Todd Hovland appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald in court for Matthew Todd Hovland.  Prosecuting attorney David S Olson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives extradition; Court accepts waiver. Bond revoked.
Review hearing scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Extradition hearing on August 19, 2022 at 10:45 am.

3:21 PM Prosecuting attorney David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Matthew Todd Hovland appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Matthew Todd Hovland. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Defendant address verified. Cash bond set of $10,000 with conditions. Matter to be set.
